porCausa

A non-profit news organization
porcausa.org/ayuda-desarrollo/

I am a co-funder of non-profit news organization porCausa, producing deeper-dive, public-service stories and long-term journalism projects on poverty and social inequalities, in collaboration with journalists and media organizations from Europe, US and Latin America.

One of the first projects is an ongoing investigation exposing and analyzing all money distributed to aid organizations by the Spanish government since 1992. In those years, Spain became the sixth largest donor in the world. The dashboard below enables the exploration of the main data being used in the project:
